name: Roll Right
description:
Roll Right An isometric puzzle game about a rolling die

In this puzzle game you control a rolling die and try to get to the finish tile in 20 different levels.

There are 4 types of tiles:

  • you can't roll onto black-magenta checkered tiles
  • the green tile is the finish tile
  • you can only roll onto red tiles if the number on the die is correct
  • cyan and yellow tiles are switches if they have a number on them else they are a tile that can be switched to be rollable or not

Tiles sometimes have numbers on them: You can only roll on those if after the roll the die shows the same number as the tile.

And don't forget: Opposite faces of the die add up to 7.
